guide: Collect Superboom TNT from dungeons
or buy some from Ophelia in The Dungeon Hub.
Then use them on the crypts you run
across inside a dungeon.
Farm crops mainly in The Garden
as they help progressing with
the XP from Crop Milestones.
Kill the Goblins you can find in the
Dwarven Mines and Crystal Hollows.
You will need Mining 12 for this.
You will most likely gain passive
progress in here. Use the best pickaxe
you can get your hands on and mine.
Use /warp trapper to accept a quest
and use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Bring a bow with you.

note: Obtain a Bronze Medal in a Farming Contest
guide: You need Farming Level 10 for this.
Your best options will most likely be
potato contests as you need a lot of
potatoes for a different goal or mushroom
contests with a silk touch gold axe.
Open chests in the Crystal Hollows (Heart of the Mountain III),
do commissions in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from the
Smithmonger in the Hub and reforge
an uncommon or higher rarity weapon with it.
You will most likely get this from
leveling up skills.
If that isnt enough, kill Endermen and
mine nodes in The End to get money.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Collect those you run along while doing other goals.
If you have trouble check TimeDeo's fairy soul
tutorial on YouTube or use /neusouls on/off
to get waypoints.
This requires Catacombs Level 3 and
a completion of the 2 floors before.
You may need help from party finder
or friends for this.
You will get this passively while going
for other grinds as you need Combat 15 for
the dungeon task. Dont forget to claim
your bestiary rewards as you unlock them.
Talk to Jamie in the Hub and
claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right click it to gain +100 Speed.
Or just wait for a splash.
Kill Spiders in the Spider's Den (/warp spider)
place a few Spider Minions and participate
in killing Arachne in Arachne's Sanctuary.
Recommended to wear a Cow Head to avoid the poison.
Dont forget to fuel your minions and give them
a storage. Also collect them in time.
You need a score of 230 or higher
in Floor 1 or higher to get this.
Opening will cost 100k coins.

note: Equip an Uncommon or higher tiered Rock Pet
guide: You get the Rock Pet from mining ores.
The Common Rock unlocks at 2.5k broken ores,
the Uncommon one at 7.5k. You can also upgrade
your common rock at Kat but this will take a day.
Obtained from completing any race with 4/4
at Guildford in the Dungeon Hub.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces including equipment)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste and Starlight Armor from Rosetta
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels. Don't forget
to do some Alchemy with Materials gathered from the Garden.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Wear Mushroom Armor enchanted with Growth 5
during the night.
Growth 5 requires Enchanting Level 5
and costs 50 Experience Levels per piece.
You will need 50k potato collection
and 160 enchanted potatoes for this.
You might want to utilize The Garden for this.
Kill Cows in The Barn to unlock this
and craft it using the materials you
got along the way.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning, but are also rarer.
You can also spawn it from mining ores in the Dwarven Mines.
&lNo eggs:
Bingo, Enderman, Grandma Wolf, Armadillo, Squid,
Guardian, Bee, Dolphin, Reindeer, Rock, Tarantula,
Owl and Zoo.
&lEggs:
Jerry, Silverfish, Pig, Rabbit, Endermite and Bat.
If you use eggs, you will need 2.5k Raw Chicken Collection
and a lot of eggs.

note: Consume a Mushed Glowy Tonic Potion
guide: Follow Moby's quest in the desert
until you unlock the shop.
Then you need 8 full Chum Buckets and
10 Glowing Mushrooms to buy it from Moby.
